name: Dev Web
tech: MongoDB / Express / ReactJS / Node / OAuth / Tailwind / Puppeteer
description: Dev Web is an online portal for developers to get the latest news and podcasts in technology and job listings.

name: Google Book Search
tech: MongoDB / Express / ReactJS / Node / Socket.io / Bulma
description: The Google Book Search is an application that enables user to search for books. They can save or remove books in the saved list.

name: Employee Directory
description: The Employee Directory is an application that generates a table of employees that can be sorted by the headings and filtered by name.

name: Budget Tracker - PWA
tech: Express / Node / ChartJS / Bootstrap / Mongoose / IndexedDB
description: Th Budget Tracker is an PWA which uses Cache and IndexedDB allowing users to use the application online and offline.

name: Novelty
description: Novelty is a book recommendation application helping book lovers track their reading list and find new books to read.

name: Eat-Da-Burger!
description: Eat-Da-Burger! is a fun little application that tracks the burgers to be eaten.

name: From Scratch
description: From Scratch is an online personal recipe box with recipes, nutrition and progress tracking.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather Dashboard is an application that displays the current weather and 5-day forecast of a city of interest.

name: Coding Challeng
description: Weather Dashboard is an online timed quiz about coding and JavaScript with a leader scoreboard.
